name: AfterShokz Aeropex Mini Headphones
description: Hear your music and your world. Tipping the scales at only 26g the Aeropex are Aftershokz lightest pair of bone conduction headphones. The angle on the transducers improve sound quality, with higher highs and thumping bass. Need to stay tuned in to what happening around you? That's where bone conduction come in, it lets you hear music and other sounds you need to take in.Designed for youth, adults with smaller heads or who like to wear their headphones snugly.Bone conduction sends sound vibrations directly to your inner ear, so your ear canal stays free to hear other sounds.Dual noise cancelling microphones help remove noise pollution, making voices crisp and clear.Titanium band is lightweight, strong and provides an even, comfortable pressure.Bluetooth 5.0 is easy on your battery, has multi-point pairing and a 40m range.Waterproof design isn’t bothered by sweat or rain.8 hours of playback or 10 days of stand-by from a single charge.Included magnetic charging cable fully charges in 2 hours (1A/5V max).LED power indicator.Integrated buttons let you answer calls, control your music and more.In the box: headphones, storage pouch, earplugs, 2 x magnetic USB charging cable and documentation.
